Verses: 1 raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaar Arubadhumuzha Uyaramum Aaru Muzha Agalamumaana Oru Porchilaiyaip Pannuviththu Baabilon Maagaanaththilirukkira Dhooraa Ennum Samaboomiyile Niruththinaan.

2 pinbu Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaar Dhesaadhipadhigalaiyum, Adhigaarigalaiyum, Thalaivaraiyum, Nyaayaadhipadhigalaiyum, Pokkishakkaararaiyum, Needhisaasthirigalaiyum, Visaarippukkaararaiyum, Naadugalilulla Uththiyogasthar Yaavaraiyum Nebugaadhnechchaar Raajaa Niruththina Silaiyin Pradhishtaikku Vandhu Serumpadi Azhaiththanuppinaan.

3 appozhudhu Dhesaadhipadhigalum, Adhigaarigalum, Thalaivarum Nyaayaadhipadhigalum, Pokkishakkaararum, Needhisaasthirigalum, Visaarippukkaararum, Naadugalin Uththiyogasthar Yaavarum, Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaar Niruththina Silaiyin Pradhishtaikku Vandhu Serndhu, Nebugaadhnechchaar Niruththina Silaikku Edhiraaga Nindraargal.
4 kattiyakkaaran Uraththa Saththamaai: Sagala Janangalum, Jaadhigalum Baashaikkaarumaanavargale, Ungalukku Arivikkappadugiradhu Ennavendraal:

5 ekkaalam, Naagasuram, Kinnaram, Veenai, Suramandalam, Thamburu Mudhalaana Sagalavidha Keedhavaaththiyangalin Saththaththai Neengal Ketkumpodhu, Neengal Thaazhavizhundhu, Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaar Niruththina Porchilaiyaip Panindhukollakkadaveergal.
6 evanaagilum Thaazha Vizhundhu, Adhaip Panindhukollaamarponaal, Avan Annerame Erigira Akkinichchoolaiyin Naduvile Podappaduvaan Endraan.

7 aadhalaal Sagala Janangalum, Ekkaalam, Naagasuram, Kinnaram, Veenai, Suramandalam Mudhalaana Sagalavidha Keedhavaaththiyangalin Saththaththaik Kettavudane, Sagala Janaththaarum Jaadhiyaarum Baashaikkaararum Thaazha Vizhundhu, Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaar Niruththina Porchilaiyaip Panindhukondaargal.
8 achchamayaththil Kaldheyaril Silar Raajasamugaththil Vandhu, Yoodharperil Kutranchaatri,
9 raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaarai Nokki: Raajaave, Neer Endrum Vaazhga.

10 ekkaalam, Naagasuram, Kinnaram, Veenai, Suramandalam, Thamburu Mudhalaana Sagalavidha Keedhavaaththiyangalin Saththaththaiyum Ketkira Endha Manushanum Thaazhavizhundhu, Porchilaiyaip Panindhukollavendumendrum,
11 evanaagilum Thaazha Vizhundhu Panindhukollaamarponaal, Avan Erigira Akkinichchoolaiyin Naduvile Podappadavendumendrum, Raajaavaagiya Neer Kattalaiyitteere.

12 baabilon Maagaanaththin Kaariyangalai Visaarikkumpadi Neer Erpaduththina Saadhraag, Meshaag, Aabedhnego Ennum Yoodharaana Manushar Irukkiraargale; Avargal Raajaavaagiya Ummai Madhikkavillai; Avargal Ummudaiya Dhevargalukku Aaraadhanai Seyyaamalum, Neer Niruththina Porchilaiyaip Panindhukollaamalum Irukkiraargal Endraargal.

13 appozhudhu Nebugaadhnechchaar Ukkirakobankondu Saadhraakkaiyum, Meshaakkaiyum, Aabedhnegovaiyum Azhaiththukkonduvarumpadi Kattalaiyittaan; Avargal Andhap Purusharai Raajaavin Samugaththil Konduvandhuvittapodhu,

14 nebugaadhnechchaar Avargalai Nokki: Saadhraag, Meshaag, Aabedhnego Enbavargale, Neengal En Dhevargalukku Aaraadhanaiseyyaamalum Naan Niruththina Porchilaiyaip Panindhukollaamalum Irundhadhu Meydhaanaa?

15 ippodhum Ekkaalam, Naagasuram, Kinnaram, Veenai, Suramandalam, Thamburu Mudhalaana Sagalavidha Keedhavaaththiyangalin Saththaththaiyum Neengal Ketkumpodhu, Thaazha Vizhundhu, Naan Pannivaiththa Silaiyaip Panindhukolla Aayaththamaayirundhaal Nalladhu; Panindhukollaadhirundhaal Annerame Erigira Akkinichchoolaiyin Naduvile Podappaduveergal; Ungalai En Kaikkuth Thappuvikkappogira Dhevan Yaar Endraan.
16 saadhraag, Meshaag, Aabedhnego Enbavargal Raajaavai Nokki: Nebugaadhnechchaare, Indhak Kaariyaththaikkuriththu Umakku Uththaravu Solla Engalukku Avasiyamillai.
17 naangal Aaraadhikkira Dhevan Engalaith Thappuvikka Vallavaraayirukkiraar; Avar Erigira Akkinichchoolaikkum, Raajaavaagiya Ummudaiya Kaikkum Neengalaakki Viduvippaar;

18 viduvikkaamarponaalum, Naangal Ummudaiya Dhevargalukku Aaraadhanai Seyvadhumillai, Neer Niruththina Porchilaiyaip Panindhukolvadhumillai Engiradhu Raajaavaagiya Umakkuth Therindhirukkakkadavadhu Endraargal.

19 appozhudhu Nebugaadhnechchaarukkuk Kadunkobamoondu: Saadhraag, Meshaag, Aabedhnego Enbavargalukku Virodhamaai Avanudaiya Mugam Verupattadhu; Soolaiyai Saadhaanaramaai Soodaakkuvadhaippaarkkilum Ezhumadangu Adhigamaai Soodaakkumpadi Uththaravukoduththu,
20 saadhraag, Meshaag, Aabedhnego Enbavargalai Erigira Akkinichchoolaiyile Poduvadharku Avargalaik Kattumpadi, Than Raanuvaththil Balasaaligalaagiya Purusharukkuk Kattalaiyittaan.
21 appozhudhu Avargal Thangal Saalvaigalodum Nisaargalodum Paagaigalodum Matra Vasthirangalodum Kattappattu, Erigira Akkinichchoolaiyin Naduvile Podappattaargal.

22 raajaavin Kattalai Kadumaiyaayirundhapadiyinaalum, Soolai Migavum Soodaakkappattirundhapadiyinaalum, Akkinijuvaalaiyaanadhu Saadhraag, Meshaag, Aabedhnego Enbavargalaith Thookkikkondupona Purusharaik Kondrupottadhu.
23 saadhraag, Meshaag, Aabedhnego Ennum Andha Moondru Purusharum Kattundavargalaai Erigira Akkinichchoolaiyin Naduvile Vizhundhaargal.

24 appozhudhu Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaar Bramiththu, Theeviramaai Ezhundhirundhu, Than Mandhirimaargalai Nokki: Moondru Purusharai Allavo Kattundavargalaaga Akkiniyile Poduviththom Endraan; Avargal Raajaavukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Aam, Raajaave Endraargal.
25 adharku Avan: Idho, Naaluper Vidudhalaiyaai Akkiniyin Naduvile Ulaavugiradhaik Kaangiren; Avargalukku Oru Sedhamumillai; Naalaam Aalin Saayal Dhevapuththiranukku Oppaayirukkiradhu Endraan.

26 appozhudhu Nebugaadhnechchaar Erigira Akkinichchoolaiyin Vaasalandaikku Vandhu, Unnadhamaana Dhevanudaiya Dhaasaraagiya Saadhraag, Meshaag, Aabedhnego Enbavargale, Neengal Veliye Vaarungal Endraan; Appozhudhu Saadhraag, Meshaag, Aabedhnego Enbavargal Akkiniyin Naduvilirundhu Veliye Vandhaargal.

27 dhesaadhipadhigalum, Adhigaarigalum, Thalaivarum, Raajaavin Mandhirigalum Koodivandhu, Andhap Purusharudaiya Sareerangalinmel Akkini Belancheyyaamalum, Avargaludaiya Thalaimayir Karugaamalum, Avargaludaiya Saalvaigal Sedhappadaamalum, Akkiniyin Manam Avargalidaththil Veesaamalum Irundhadhaik Kandaargal.

28 appozhudhu Nebugaadhnechchaar Vasaniththu: Saadhraag, Meshaag, Aabedhnego Enbavargaludaiya Dhevanukku Sthoththiram; Avargal Thangaludaiya Dhevanaith Thavira Veroru Dhevanaiyum Seviththup Paniyaamal, Avaraiye Nambi, Raajaavin Kattalaiyaith Thalli, Thangal Sareerangalai Oppukkoduththadhinaal, Avar Thamadhu Thoodhanai Anuppi, Thammudaiya Dhaasarai Viduviththaar.

29 aadhalaal Saadhraag, Meshaag, Aabedhnego Enbavargaludaiya Dhevanukku Virodhamaaga Dhooshana Vaarththaiyai Sollugira Endha Janaththaanum, Endha Jaadhiyaanum, Endha Baashaikkaaranum Thundiththuppodappaduvaan; Avan Veedu Erukkalamaakkappadum Endru Ennaale Theermaanikkappadugiradhu; Ivvidhamaai Ratchikkaththakka Dhevan Veroruvarum Illaiyendraan.
30 pinbu Raajaa Saadhraag, Meshaag, Aabedhnego Enbavargalai Baabilon Dhesaththile Uyarththinaan.
